question: The sum of the interior angles of a triangle is ______________ degrees.
The value of pi (π) is approximately ______________.
The formula for the area of a circle is A = ______________.
The value of x in the equation 2x + 5 = 11 is ______________.
The sum of the squares of the legs of a right triangle is equal to the square of the ______________.
The formula for the volume of a rectangular prism is V = ______________.
The value of 2^3 is ______________.
The equation of a line in slope-intercept form is y = ______________.
The value of x in the equation x - 3 = 7 is ______________.
The formula for the area of a triangle is A = ______________.
The value of 5! (5 factorial) is ______________.
The equation of a circle with center (h, k) and radius r is (x - h)^2 + (y - k)^2 = ______________.
The value of x in the equation 4x = 28 is ______________.
The formula for the surface area of a sphere is A = ______________.
The value of 3 × 4 is ______________.
The equation of a parabola in vertex form is y = ______________.
The value of x in the equation x + 2 = 9 is ______________.
The formula for the volume of a cone is V = ______________.
The value of 7 - 2 is ______________.
The equation of a line in point-slope form is y - y1 = ______________.
